textBox.richText: Our vacation started well with a layover in New York city. We stayed at the Hudson Hotel and modest, stylish affair close to central park. Nadia had received coupons from Santa to buy a doll at the “American Girl Place” and Anton had a coupon for some Star Wars “stuff”. We ate at Planet Hollywood after visiting Times Square and stopped for a pilgrimage at the Apple Store. Then madness began ... trying to take a plane from JFK on the 23rd of December is an experience that I would recommend to all of my enemies. A few NYC photos are HERE.
